Cortico Static

This site is for static content used by the Cortico patient engagement system.

Cortico provides patient intake and telehealth software for OSCAR EMR.

Cortico Knowledge Base

  • Cortico Knowledge Base
  • help@cortico.ca

Cortico software is designed for physicians & clinic managers to eliminate overhead and reduce in-clinic wait times. Our knowledge base focuses on relevant content, especially telehealth & EMR.
